know_more: When minute hand points to 12 - read the hour hand!
6:00 - hour hand on 6 minute hand on 12.
9 oclock - the hour hand points to 9!
12:00 - both hands point straight up!
Half past = 30 minutes. Minute hand on 6!
At :30 the minute hand is on the 6 (bottom).
Quarter past = 15 minutes. Minute hand on 3!
4:45 is also called quarter to 5!
The short hand shows hours the long hand shows minutes.
15 minutes = quarter of an hour!
Count from 2 to 4: thats 2 hours!
From :00 to :30 is always 30 minutes (half hour)!
1:00 to 2:00 = 1 hour. Then 2:00 to 2:30 = 30 min. Total: 1.5 hours!
Count: 5→6 (1hr) 6→7 (2hr) 7→8 (3hr) = 3 hours!
From :00 to :45 is 45 minutes (3 quarters of an hour)!
1 o'clock - hour hand points to 1!
2:00 - both hands make an L shape!
5 o'clock - minute hand up hour hand on 5!
8:30 - halfway between 8 and 9!
15 minutes after 5 o'clock!
11:45 is 15 minutes before noon!
From 4 to 7 is 3 hours: 4→5→6→7!
15 minutes = quarter of an hour!
